name: Hello I am Orb
description:
Note this is a Post LD Build

Can you save Earth from a deadly invasion while sleeping in your room?

LMB Select Unit

LMB Move To (point on grid) or Attack (with selected Ship)

WASD Move Camera

RMB + Move Mouse Turn Camera.

R/F Mouse Wheel to Zoom Camera

+++ Changes +++ WIP

v0.1.2

Hulks of Destroyed Ships

v0.1.1

Explosions

UI and other Tweaks

Slowed down game so more time for players to think, should game speed be a difficulty setting?

v0.1

Lots of Game Mechanics Tweaks and Changes.

Selection Outlines Added and Spheres Size Corrected.

RMB to control camera view.
